text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Kyupiiin!☆ 
My Umadol Sensor is pinging! 
I've chosen you—it's decided, 
just like that!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
...Oh, wait, wait! Please don't leave! 
I'm sorry, could you just hear me out 
—please!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Listen, listen up! 
I have a little something I'd really love 
your help with!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, it's almost Falko's birthday! 
Oh, you'll celebrate with me? 
Thank you so much♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But listen, Falko is an Umadol! 
For an Umadol, a birthday isn't just 
a day to be celebrated by others—

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
"It's a day to share my thanks 
with everyone who always cheers 
for me!" Which is why—

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falko wants to hold a Birthday Live! 
And I want it to be a massive, 
spectacular, BOOM of an event!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That's why I need you to gather the 
absolute maximum number of people 
by the day of the concert!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falko is going to work hard on my lessons 
too! I've even put together a 
ultra-mega-super special menu!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That's why—I'm begging you! 
Please help Falko make this Birthday Live 
a huge success!
